name: ecommerce_and_retail_email
description: Ecommerce and retail email template with hero image, personalized greeting, product showcase (4 products with images, names, descriptions), tagline section, navigation links, and unsubscribe. Features responsive design optimized for email clients.

samples.main_message_text: You asked, we listened. Our most-loved rugs are finally back in stock. These designs tend to sell out fast, so now's your chance to bring one home.
samples.product_1_description: Natural texture, timeless appeal. Perfect for grounding any space with laid-back charm.
samples.product_2_description: Bold lines and modern design. A statement piece that makes every room pop.
samples.product_3_description: Soft underfoot, rich in pattern. Crafted to bring warmth and global flair to your home.
samples.product_4_description: Faded elegance meets everyday durability. The lived-in look you'll love for years.
samples.tagline_description: Our rugs are sustainably crafted and ethically made, bringing beauty to your space and fairness to the artisans who create them.

${custom_html}

fieldPrompt.hero_image_url: Enter URL for the hero/banner image
fieldPrompt.product_1_image_url: Enter URL for the first product image
fieldPrompt.product_2_image_url: Enter URL for the second product image
fieldPrompt.product_3_image_url: Enter URL for the third product image
fieldPrompt.product_4_image_url: Enter URL for the fourth product image
fieldPrompt.nav_link_1: Enter the first navigation link text
fieldPrompt.nav_link_2: Enter the second navigation link text
fieldPrompt.nav_link_3: Enter the third navigation link text
